mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM item_commodity_info as i JOIN item_commodity_category as c on i.category_id = c.category_id where c.category_id = #{secondCategoryId}
select * FROM item_commodity_info c INNER JOIN item_info i ON c.item_id = i.item_id

select avatar_imag as commodity_pic, i.item_commodity_name, i.price, i.commodity_id, info.item_name, info.user_image as sellerPic, info.membership FROM item_collection ic INNER JOIN item_commodity_info i ON ic.commodity_id = i.commodity_id inner join item_info info on info.item_id = i.item_id
WHERE ic.user_id = #{userId} AND i.`status` = 0 AND ic.`status` = 0

SELECT avatar_imag as commodity_pic, i.item_commodity_name, i.price, i.commodity_id, info.item_name, info.user_image as sellerPic, info.membership FROM item_commodity_history h INNER JOIN item_commodity_info i ON h.commodity_id = i.commodity_id inner join item_info info on info.item_id = i.item_id WHERE h.user_id = #{userId} order by h.create_time DESC LIMIT #{page},#{limit}
SELECT commodity_id, `status`, avatar_imag, item_commodity_name, price FROM item_commodity_info WHERE item_id = #{itemId}

SELECT c.commodity_id, i.item_name, i.user_image AS seller_pic, c.`status`, c.avatar_imag AS commodity_pic, c.item_commodity_name, c.price, iu.membership FROM item_info i INNER JOIN user_info u ON i.uid = u.uid INNER JOIN item_info iu on i.uid = iu.uid INNER JOIN item_commodity_info c ON i.item_id = c.item_id WHERE i.item_id = #{itemId} AND c.`status` !=0

select commodity_id,price,item_commodity_name,avatar_imag,create_time,details from item_commodity_info where item_id = #{itemId} and status = 0
order By price
order By price desc
limit #{page},#{limit}

SELECT DISTINCT c.commodity_id, info.membership, c.price, c.origin_price, c.item_commodity_name, c.avatar_imag, c.details FROM item_info info INNER JOIN item_commodity_info c ON info.item_id=c.item_id WHERE c.commodity_id IN #{item} order by price asc order by price desc

select count(*) FROM item_collection ic INNER JOIN item_commodity_info i ON ic.commodity_id = i.commodity_id inner join item_info info on info.item_id = i.item_id
WHERE ic.user_id = #{userId} AND i.`status` = 0 AND ic.`status` = 0
SELECT count(*) FROM item_commodity_history h INNER JOIN item_commodity_info i ON h.commodity_id = i.commodity_id inner join item_info info on info.item_id = i.item_id WHERE h.user_id = #{userId}
select count(*) from item_commodity_info where item_id = #{itemId} and status = 0
